import React, { Component } from 'react'; import $ from 'jquery'; import { findDOMNode } from 'react-dom'; import '../AdminCss/adminaddteacher.css'; import 'jquery-ui-bundle'; import 'jquery-ui-bundle/jquery-ui.css'; import Navbar from '../../SideNavMenu'; class AdminAddTeacher extends Component { componentDidMount() { $(function () { $(".datepicker").datepicker(); }); $("#transport").selectmenu({ width: 200, }); function readURL(input) { if (input.files && input.files[0]) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function (e) { $('#profile-img-tag').attr('src', e.target.result); } reader.readAsDataURL(input.files[0]); } } $('#profile-img').change(function () { readURL(this); }); //Get Add Subjects & Role const subject_url = 'http://localhost:8000/subjects/getAllSubject'; fetch(subject_url) .then((response)=>{ return response.json(); }) .then((data)=>{ console.log(data); }) } render() { return (
